/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street, lined with cars and buildings, stretches out into the distance, leading the eye towards a bridge that arches over the water. The sky above is a clear blue, adding a serene backdrop to the urban landscape. In the distance, trees can be seen, their green foliage contrasting with the concrete structures around them. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and the expanse of the sky. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the blue of the sky and water standing out against the more muted tones of the buildings and cars. The perspective of the image gives a sense of depth and scale, highlighting the bustling cityscape of Beijing.
